objects.description: [Industroyer](https://collaborate.mitre.org/attackics/index.php/Software/S0001), modules operate by inhibiting the normal SCADA master communication functions and then activate a replacement master communication module managed by the malware, which executes a script of commands to issue normal protocol messages.(Citation: ESET Win32/Industroyer Jun 2017)

external_references.description: Anton Cherepanov, ESET. (2017, June 12). Win32/Industroyer: A new threat for industrial control systems. Retrieved September 15, 2017.
